author: Brad Colbow
description:

Best Monitors for Mac - https://benqurl.biz/4kV6JZP

I've had my eye on these BenQ monitors for a while buy never took the plunge because they aren't drawing tablets. But they are used by a lot of character designers, game designers, VFX artists, animators, concept artists who are looking for compilatory displays that can rival the color their drawing tablets put out and that's what this monitor does so well.
